	name="STATE_247"

		buildings = {

		}

		set_variable = { state_religion_christianity = 0.75 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_taoism = 0.01 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_confucianism = 0.03 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_secularism = 0.2 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_cthulhu = 0 }
	}

	provinces={
